name: sonsoftheforest
description:
Sons of the Forest Dedicated Server (SteamCMD + Wine, Flux-friendly).

This spec uses two components:
- `data` provides a larger local (non-synced) /data volume for Steam install + Wine prefix.
- `server` runs the game server, mounts `0:/data` and uses `g:/config` for synced config+saves.

compose.name: data
compose.description: Local cache volume for Steam/Wine (not synced)

compose.name: server
compose.description: Sons of the Forest server (g:/config for saves; local /data install)
